articles.author: Sudhi Ranjan Sen, Peter Martin, Iain Marlow
articles.title: Modi’s Embrace of Putin Irks Biden Team Pushing Support for Kyiv - Bloomberg
articles.description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s embrace of Vladimir Putin on the eve of President Joe Biden’s pivotal NATO summit in Washington has frustrated US officials who have made closer ties with the Asian nation a cornerstone of their foreign policy.
